attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bring Back British Rail campaign demands:

- An end to private interest in public transport.

- A fully integrated, publicly-owned rail network, in which the passengers are always the most important stakeholders.

- Consistently low priced fares and fast, frequent and efficient services which have the capacity to continually improve and expand in order to encourage more people to choose rail travel as a real, green alternative to their cars.

Please visit the campaign website for more information:

bringbackbritishrail.org

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to Bring Back British Rail.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=bringbackbr


Her Majesty's Government
